entities.name: t om riddle
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having visited the spot with his youthful victims.

entities.name: orphans
entities.description: A group of people who were taken to the spot for sea air and a view of the waves.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: A person who is not a wizard or witch.

entities.name: youthful victims
entities.description: The people who were victimized by Tom Riddle.

entities.name: cliffs behind us
entities.description: A location where the orphans and Tom Riddle visited.

entities.name: waves
entities.description: The natural feature that the orphans were taken to see.

relationships.description: Tom Riddle was the one who victimized these people.
Tom Riddle visited this location with his youthful victims.
The orphans were taken to see the waves.
Muggles cannot reach this location unless they are uncommonly good mountaineers.
